00034 #ifndef UPNP_CONTROLPOINT_H
00035 #define UPNP_CONTROLPOINT_H
00036 
00037 #include <QObject>
00038 #include <QDomNode>
00039 #include <QMap>
00040 #include <QString>
00041 
00042 class QHttp;
00043 
00044 namespace UPnP
00045 {
00046 
00047 // A datablock to make the exchange
00048 // of service information easier
00049 struct ServiceParameters
00050 {
00051         QString hostname;
00052         int     port;
00053         QString scpdUrl;
00054         QString controlUrl;
00055         QString serviceId;
00056         QString serviceType;
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00071 class Service : public QObject
00072 {
00073         Q_OBJECT
00074 
00075 public:  // public methods
00076         // The constructor for the root service
00077         Service(const QString &hostname, int port, const QString &informationUrl);
00078         // The constructor for action services
00079         Service(const ServiceParameters &params);
00080         // The destructor
00081         virtual             ~Service();
00082 
00083         // Get the number of pending requests
00084         int                  getPendingRequests() const;
00085 
00086 
00087 protected:  // Protected methods
00088         // Makes a UPnP action request
00089         int                  callAction(const QString &actionName, const QString &prefix);
00090         // Makes a UPnP action request
00091         int                  callAction(const QString &actionName, const QMap<QString,QString> &arguments, const QString &prefix);
00092         // Makes a UPnP service request
00093         int                  callInformationUrl();
00094 
00095         // The control point received an action failure indication
00096         virtual void         gotActionErrorResponse(const QDomNode &response);
00097         // The control point received a response to callAction()
00098         virtual void         gotActionResponse(const QString &responseType, const QMap<QString,QString> &resultValues);
00099         // The control point received a response to callInformationUrl()
00100         virtual void         gotInformationResponse(const QDomNode &response);
00101 
00102 private slots:
00103         // The QHttp object retrieved data.
00104         void                 slotRequestFinished(int id, bool error);
00105 
00106 private:
00107         // Makes a UPnP action request (keeps pointers from the external interface)
00108         int                  callActionInternal(const QString &actionName, const QMap<QString,QString> *arguments, const QString &prefix);
00109 
00110 private:
00111         // The URL to control the service
00112         QString              m_szControlUrl;
00113         // The HTTP requester
00114         QHttp               *m_pHttp;
00115         // The URL to request service information
00116         QString              m_szInformationUrl;
00117         // The number of pending queries/actions
00118         int                  m_iPendingRequests;
00119         // The ID of the service
00120         QString              m_szServiceId;
00121         // The Type of the service
00122         QString              m_szServiceType;
00123         // The xml prefix used by the router
00124         QString              m_szBaseXmlPrefix;
00125         // hostname
00126         QString              m_szHostname;
00127         //port
00128         int                  m_iPort;
00129 
00130 signals:
00131         // Called when a query completed
00132         void                 queryFinished(bool error);
00133 };
00134 
00135 }
00136 
00137 #endif
